Miguel Bautista_

design & development_

Coffee/ Tea powered front-end engineer. Cyberpunk dreamer. Code-slinging denizen of the vast and infinite net.

  • about
  • skills

About Me_

who am I?

I'm a front-end developer & designer. Every day I'm driven to design and program experiences that are crisp, semantic, and meaningful. The idea that I work in an industry that requires both creativity and tenacity is something that serves to inspire me daily.

When I'm not building things for the web, you can find me face deep in some science fiction, having a cup of coffee/ earl grey, or thinking up my next short story.

get in touch

Skills_

things i've learned

Driven my my passion to code and create, I have a set of skills that provides me with a solid foundation to tackle a variety of projects and challenges. My skillset reflects my drive to grow personally and adapt professionally.

development

My CSS and javascript skills are extremely strong, scaffolded by semantic HTML.

Contact_

let's connect!

I'm based in Toronto, and have a more than unhealthy obsession with tea (earl grey, hot). I welcome the chance to meetup and chat!

You can shoot me a note at contact@heymiguel.com, or using the form below.

send me a message
